.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_DESCRIPTOR_UPDATE_TEMPLATE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-pDescriptorUpdateEntries-parameter]] pname:pDescriptorUpdateEntries must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:descriptorUpdateEntryCount valid sname:VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateEntry structures
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-templateType-parameter]] pname:templateType must: be a valid elink:VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateType value
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-descriptorSetLayout-parameter]] If pname:descriptorSetLayout is not dlink:VK_NULL_HANDLE, pname:descriptorSetLayout must: be a valid sname:VkDescriptorSetLayout handle
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-descriptorUpdateEntryCount-arraylength]] pname:descriptorUpdateEntryCount must: be greater than `0`
* [[VUID-VkDescriptorUpdateTemplateCreateInfo-commonparent]] Both of pname:descriptorSetLayout, and pname:pipelineLayout that are valid handles must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from the same sname:VkDevice
****
